sentences: Meil on veel kaks nädalat eksamiteni.
See projekt võtab aega kolm nädalat.
context: The word 'nädalat' is the partitive case form of 'nädala', which means 'week' in Estonian. In this context, it represents one week or an unspecified number of weeks (partitive case). It's commonly used when talking about duration or time periods that are not specified as exact whole numbers.
